sections.title: What is nICP?
sections.content: nICP is a token representing ICP locked in a 6-month neuron. You can benefit from the yield generated by the neuron while still having liquid tokens.

sections.title: Is it decentralized?
sections.content: nICP is fully decentralized by design, neurons are directly controlled and managed by a canister, itself controlled by the NNS. No human intervention is required in any part of the process.

sections.title: How can nICP have a better APY than a 6-month neuron?
sections.content: Subject to a six-month unlock period, nICP may offer a higher APY compared to staking in a neuron. How is this possible? nICP is managed by a DAO initiated via the SNS. All SNS ICP is staked in an eight-year neuron, and 90% of the yield is redirected to nICP stakers. The remaining 10% is allocated to the WaterNeuron DAO.

sections.title: How do I convert ICP to nICP?
sections.content: Exchange your ICP for nICP tokens at the current exchange rate. Your ICP will be committed to a six-month neuron where it will begin accruing yield.

sections.title: How do I convert back nICP to ICP?
sections.content: Your nICP will be burned and a six-month neuron in dissolving mode will be created with the corresponding amount of ICP at the current exchange rate. After the six-month period, you will receive your ICP as soon as your neuron is disbursed.

sections.title: What is the exchange rate?
sections.content: Simply put, it is the ratio of the number of nICPs minted to the amount of ICP locked in the six-month neurons.

sections.title: What is the WaterNeuron DAO?
sections.content: The WaterNeuron DAO manages the voting on proposals on behalf of nICP holders. Holders of the governance token are entitled to receive 10% of the yield generated by the neurons.

sections.title: What are the fees?
sections.content: There are no fees for converting ICP to nICP or vice versa. 10% of the ICP yield from the neurons is directed to the DAO.

sections.title: What are the risks?
sections.content: Like any DeFi application, the primary risk is a smart contract bug. To mitigate this, the WaterNeuron DAO has established a bug bounty program.
